name: Project Solis - Demo
description:
PROJECT SOLIS - Demo                    [Latest update on July 29, 2021]
Created by Ossi Rajala

This is a demo for game Project Solis. It is currently work in progress so things will change more or less as I continue making it :)

Best played in full screen mode with Full HD sized screen.

Controls (Keyboard):

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Attack - J

Crouch - S

Fire skill (when acquired) - K

Map - E

Restart - T

Teleport next to the boss room - B

Controls (Xbox One):

Movement - dpad

Jump - A

Attack - X

Crouch - down

Fire skill (when acquired) - RB

Map - View
